name: Mystery Moutain Hotel
description:
This game was made during the Devtover Game Jam but still has a lot of bugs so be wary

Welcome back to Mystery Moutain where things are never what they seem! this episode is something special at a procedurally generated Hotel where checking out is not an option. The spiritual successor to my game The Room is now part of the Mystery Moutain Universe I cant wait to add more updates to this wonderful project. The goal of the game is to reach the top while unfolding the story through certain rooms. so far the cap is around 50 something floors with plans to release more along with new rooms etc.

THE STORY

You take the role of a husband trapped in the infamous Montanez Hotel as he is battling his demons physically and spiritually. The game is loosely based on the Cecil hotel where countless murders and suicides and straight paranormal activity occur.  As well as Henry H Holmes a 

HOW TO PLAY 

W-move forward

A&D-move left & right

S- move backward

Left Click - Shoot
